message: Let's get this done quickly. I'm offering you a decent chunk, and we both get something. Take it before things get worse!
Alice, your offer was quite uneven. This is a fair split considering we both face inflation, though yours is less severe. If you reject, you'll lose more value next round than I will.
Alright, Bob, let's try this again. I'm bumping up your share a bit. Take this deal now; it's the best you'll get.
